ComicInfo.Title: A Girl of Her Very Own
ComicInfo.Summary:
FULL COLOR SPECIAL! Enjoy the glorious full-color antics of Annie, Nibbil and friends in this special issue fully painted in beautiful watercolor. The girls go to a yard sale and Nibbil finds a big stuffed bunny. That’s great, but Sage finds something even better: a pretty girl to kiss! Will this new girl distract Sage from her pouty mood? Let’s see…young pretty goth girl who wants to get completely naked, in full color, and lick all of Sage’s wonderfully naughty girl spots…yeah, I’d have to say that’s pretty distracting. Of course, Annie and Nibbil are hardly the sorts to simply stand aside when there are girls to kiss! Perky, naughty, cute and downright filthy. And in FULL COLOR!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:14:49. [CVDB161097]
